name: Fall.io - Race of Dino
description:
Do you enjoy playing durable running games, racing against other opponents? It's great that you know our game. It will give you the feeling of a real race.
Here, you will be attracted to a fun and challenging game. Transform into dinosaurs and fight. Help your Dino not fall and become the last in this fun arena.

--------------------GAME RULE------------------

There are 2 rounds and 50 players. You have to race, pass at least 30 opponents to reach the top 20 fastest finishers, and participate in round 2. In round 2, help your dinosaur not fall down to become the only one on the ring. You will win.

--------------------PLAY TIPS------------------
Use 2 buttons on the screen. Run, Jump, Dash and Avoid obstacles and traps to race to the finish and become the ultimate Dino.
Use intelligence and selectivity to get through the door.

------------------GAME FEATURES----------------
- Simple and fun game
- Cool and fun colored environment.
- Easy controls
- Beautiful graphics
- Realistic object physics
- Intuitive interface

Play Fall.io now. Good luck!
